docs.lead_paragraph: Any day now, David Murdock, the 92-year-old owner of Dole Food Co, will find out whether his decision to go to trial to defend the terms of his 2013 buyout of the company was heroic or foolish.

headline.main: America's Oldest CEO Puts His Dole Buyout to a High-Stakes Test
headline.print_headline: America's Oldest CEO Puts His Dole Buyout to a High-Stakes Test

docs.snippet: Any day now, David Murdock, the 92-year-old owner of Dole Food Co, will find out whether his decision to go to trial to defend the terms of his 2013 buyout of the company was heroic or foolish.

headline.main: What Eating 40 Teaspoons of Sugar a Day Can Do to You
headline.print_headline: A Spoonful of Medicine About Sugar

docs.abstract: “That Sugar Film” takes a look at what happens when you give up fresh foods for sugar-laden processed foods.
docs.snippet: “That Sugar Film” takes a look at what happens when you give up fresh foods for sugar-laden processed foods.

docs.lead_paragraph: A Palestinian detainee in the ninth week of his hunger strike fell unconscious at an Israeli hospital on Friday in a case that could test Israel's new force-feeding law.

headline.main: Palestinian Hunger Striker Loses Consciousness in Israeli Hospital
headline.print_headline: Palestinian Hunger Striker Loses Consciousness in Israeli Hospital

docs.snippet: A Palestinian detainee in the ninth week of his hunger strike fell unconscious at an Israeli hospital on Friday in a case that could test Israel's new force-feeding law.

docs.lead_paragraph: By paying experts who side with them, the company is trying to divert attention from products that contribute to obesity, heart disease and diabetes.

headline.main: Coke Tries to Sugarcoat the Truth on Calories

docs.abstract: Editorial expresses skepticism about objectivity of Global Energy Balance Network, nonprofit research group funded by Coca-Cola that seeks to emphasize exercise, rather than diet, as solution to obesity; notes evidence suggests opposite is true; observes company faces sharply declining sales as Americans drink fewer sugary sodas.
docs.snippet: By paying experts who side with them, the company is trying to divert attention from products that contribute to obesity, heart disease and diabetes.

docs.lead_paragraph: Michel Allatuain waited beneath the 14th century fortress at the port of this Greek island on Thursday, desperate for a ferry ticket to the European mainland and a better life.

docs.lead_paragraph: For many U.S. companies and investors, the volatility in world markets this week, following Beijing's surprise currency devaluation, presents the challenge of balancing the country's current uncertain economic prospects against the hope for long term growth from the world's most populous nation.
